title: Bug 6410 - File marked as dirty without changes during code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirty even though there are no actual changes, and code assist does not appear as expected.
OB: While using code assist, the file is marked as dirty without any actual changes. Additionally, the code assist feature does not appear.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirty if no actual changes have been made during code assist. Furthermore, code assist should appear as expected when invoked.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
3. For example, consider 'I' to be the cursor below:
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
4. Press Ctrl+Space to invoke code assist.
